name: Batteries not included (onszik)
description:
My game for march

Manage your battery placement to protect from the evil dinosaurs (or monsters maybe)

Controls:

WASD or Arrow Keys - Move

Space - Interact

This game was originally meant for mini jam 73 but i kinda took a month longer than I needed to to make it. I'm not very happy with this and its super unbalanced but its whatever and I overscoped. Also I used too many fonts, theres like 4 fonts in the game.

Resources used:

Explosion Sounds by Michel Baradari on opengameart.org
Additional sounds from Zapsplat.com

Music "Harmful or Fatal" by Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
